items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Breville Joule Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro Countertop Oven for $399.95 shipped. It’s coming down off its $500 full price after spending the time since mid/late-August keeping there, with only three previous discounts dropping the costs this low over the year, while a few others went as low as $450. Today’s deal gives you another shot at its all-time lowest price that we have tracked, letting you update or upgrade your kitchen countertops with $100 savings. As a cheaper alternative, there’s also Breville’s Smart Oven Pro down at $215.95 shipped too.

items.summary: JUBA, Nov. 18 (Xinhua) -- South Sudan's government said it has stepped up vigilance along its borders following an outbreak of the Marburg virus in neighboring Ethiopia. Read full story

items.title: Woot is beating Dell’s early Black Friday prices for these 2025 Alienware Aurora RTX 50-series desktops at up to $650 off
items.summary:
Woot is currently offering a couple of Alienware’s Aurora RTX 50-series gaming desktops at up to $650 off. The more powerful variant of the two with an Ultra 9 285/32GB/1TB/5080 is available for $2,349.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This particular config typically goes for $3,000 directly at Dell, meaning Woot is offering a straight-up $650 discount on it today. Dell is currently offering it for $2,599.99 shipped as part of its ongoing Black Friday sale, but Woot’s offer beats it by a solid $250. There’s also an RTX 5060 Ti-powered Aurora desktop that’s fetching $1,199.99 Prime shipped at Woot, down from its usual price of $1,700. You can put together the same PC for $1,300 at Dell, but Woot is once again beating that price with an additional $100 discount. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Preparations "basically complete" for Hainan FTP's special customs operations: officials
items.summary: BEIJING, Nov. 18 (Xinhua) -- Preparatory work for China's Hainan Free Trade Port (FTP) to commence special customs operations is "basically complete," the country's customs authorities revealed on Tuesday, as the one-month countdown to the launch of the FTP began. Read full story

items.title: Blue Origin's New Glenn rocket deploys Mars satellites, sticks booster landing
items.summary: CAPE CANAVERAL, Florida (Reuters) -The giant New Glenn rocket from billionaire Jeff Bezos' space company Blue Origin launched from Florida on its debut mission for paying customers on Thursday, sending two NASA satellites toward Mars and nailing the return landing of its reusable booster for the first time. Read full story

items.title: Italy's Univer to establish China HQ with 300-mln-yuan investment

items.title: EcoFlow’s next 48-hour flash sale drops DELTA Pro 400W solar bundle to new $1,599 low (Reg. $3,999), more
items.summary:
EcoFlow has launched its final early Black Friday 48-hour flash sale before it kicks into its second phase on November 20, with up to 67% discounts on four offers – two power station bundles and two dual expansion battery bundles. The standout for folks wanting more versatile charging options is EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Portable Power Station with a 400W solar panel at $1,599 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $300. This bundle would normally run for $4,898 at full price here, while it keeps down at $3,999 at Amazon when in full, though Prime members have had the opportunity to score it under $2,000 for months now. Discounts over the year have only taken the costs on this bundle down as low as $1,799 up until today, with this greater 60% markdown taking $2,400 off the going rate (67% taking $3,299 off the MSRP) and landing it at a new all-time low price. Head below to learn more about it and the other offers lasting through November 19.

items.summary:
Navee has officially launched its Black Friday Sale, which is not only seeing up to 30% initial discounts across its lineup of e-scooters, but is also offering a bonus $100 sitewide savings using the code BFVIP at checkout. One notable returning low price during this sale is on the flagship ST3 Pro Smart Electric Scooter at $659.99 shipped, after using the promo code BFVIP at checkout, beating out its Amazon pricing by $100. It carries a $950 MSRP, but we usually see it keeping down between $760 and $850 on average, with today’s rate having only appeared once before back during July’s Prime Day event. Now, you’re getting a second chance to score $190 off the going rate (and $290 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked since it hit the market in January. Head below to learn more about this scooter that I cannot stop raving about after going hands-on in our review, as well as the massive lineup of deals we’re seeing across the brand’s e-scooters.

This particular model hit the scene earlier this year in May carrying a $170 price tag, and it hasn’t seen many discounts dropping it down from its full price. It saw its first deal last month when it hit $150, but today’s offer steps it up with an additional $15 off. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this pro-grade gamepad to date, and you’ll also find the brand’s standard Backbone One 2nd-gen models starting at $60 right now. items.title: Score a Switch 2-compatible Express microSD this Black Friday w/ TEAMGROUP’s 800MB/s cards from just $36 (Up to 44% off)
items.summary:
Courtesy of TEAMGROUP’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score its latest 128GB Switch 2-compatible Apex Express microSD card for $35.99 shipped. This unit normally sells for $48, but it’s now seeing a 25% markdown. Today’s deal shaves $12 off its usual going rate, landing it $4 below its previous all-time low and our mention from a couple of months back. The Apex Express microSD is available in capacities ranging from 128GB to 1TB, and they’re all discounted right now with up to 44% off. The Switch 2-compatible Express microSD cards, as you probably already know, are almost always sold out – let alone discounted – so you might want to jump in now to snag these if you’ve been planning a storage upgrade for your Switch 2 before the holidays. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Sony officially details 2025 PlayStation Black Friday deals: $100 off PS5 and PS5 Pro, 33% off PS Plus, more
items.summary:
Sony has just officially announced the 2025 PlayStation Black Friday deals. Some early details on this year’s PlayStation Black Friday sale have already surfaced by way of leaks, the PlayStation X account, and the official GameStop Black Friday ad, but Sony has now taken to the PlayStation Blog to officially detail this year’s deals – console bundles, controllers, PS Plus, games, and more, as well as the prices and start times.
